app.FAQ:
FAQ

Do I need to open an Ethereum account to participate in pre-sale/token sale?
No, we create an Ethereum account and will mint tokens to this account after a few days of token sale end.

What if I already have an Ethereum account and want to have DTT tokens on this account?
After token minting you will be able to transfer DTT tokens to any Ethereum account from dashboard.

When will tokens be minted (released)?
Tokens will be minted after each stage of the token sale (after pre-sale, after Round A of the token sale and after Round B of the token sale)

What is a schedule of token sale?
Crowdsale of DataTrading Tokens (DTT) will be conducted in three stages:
  • pre-sale 11.20.2017–11.30.2017
  • token sale: round A, for the eastern region 12.18.2017–01.08.2018
  • token sale: round B, for the western region 02.01.2018–02.22.2018

Does DataTrading Tokens conforms ERC20 standart?
Yes.

Do you have bounty program?
Yes, you can get detailed info at bitcointalk

What payment options do you have?
On pre-sale — BTC, ETH
On token-sale — BTC, ETH, LTC, DASH

What bonuses can I receive?
30% bonuses for all pre-sale participants, up to 20% for token-sale participants.

What limits does pre-sale have?
Hard cap of pre-sale is 1,000,000 USD, the maximum amount of tokens to purchase is $30,000 at the current exchange rate.

What is DataTrading token smart contract address?
0x049a5bf874f241d94232137ef728a9c7dd0d7550
